casebody.data:
STATE v. REESE. No. COA05-558. Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed April 18, 2006. Certification Date May 8, 2006. Appeal from the Gaston, (98CRS32925, 98CRS32926, 98CRS32927, 99CRS7184, 99CRS15235).

Case reported without published opinion. No error in part, reversed and remanded in part.
